Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: We had a four course dinner here and every course was delicious. The dishes were tailored based on dietery requirements. The service was exceptional! The wine pairing was also very good, with some interesting Italian wines. All the dishes ‚Ä¶

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Simply delicious food, prepared with fresh products. We had an amazing dinner in this very nice restaurant. Staff was nice ans helpful.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Very special Italian taste in Amsterdam. We went for four-course menu and all of them were great. Very good fine-diningü•≥

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Very charming Italian restaurant using fresh and quality ingredients. Staff were so friendly , attentive and professional. Food were very tasty with equally great wine pairings. Had a great dinner at this lovely restaurant, I would certainly return!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: We elected the 4 course option with wine pairings and were blown away by their selections, portion size, flavors and service.  It was on/above par with any Michelin restaurant we've dined at in the past.  Job well done by Fabio and his team!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: We went through a seven course menu. And it's my third visit to this place. Every single bite is a celebration of life, excellence without exceptions, no matter the season or the ingredients! Cooking at a whole other level indeed! I think ‚Ä¶

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Great food with amazing staff. Together you create your personal menu with your diet wishes taking into consideration. The wine pairing with it was also a great selection.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Delicious food, good atmosphere and really professional personnel (not the student type, but seasoned professionals who are friendly and know what they‚Äôre talking about and do so with passion). Highly recommended

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: I enjoyed our evening there but the food was a mix of good, great and bland and the wine pairing was poor

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: You can either go with the set menus or have a la carte. The more courses you go for, the smaller the portions will get. Recommendation to not go for set menu courses, the value per meal makes more sense with the size of portions you will get.

Name: Pianeta Terra

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Elegant and cosy atmosphere, amazing vegetarian and fish dishes and great & professional service

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: One of the best Italian restaurants in Amsterdam: high quality ingredients, very tasty food and a very good selection of Natural wines! The staff is extrimely friendly and you experience the authentic Italian atmosphere and hospitality. Definitely recommended if you are a foodie.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Delicious, excellent service and cozy atmosphere. Thank you Raul, Fabio, Laura and Staff!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Very good service and food . We took ‚Äútour for 3‚Äù menu and each part was perfect

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Very nice Italian themed contemporary fine dine restaurant that uses local produce.  The menus are all surprise menus, you choose what kind of feeling and how many courses you like. The recommended wines suited our menu perfect and for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: The food, the wines, the atmosphere and the service are brilliant. I look forward to visit you again when I will be in Amsterdam soon.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: I don‚Äôt know what to say other than AMAZING! My husband and I had the 5 course meal with the suggested wine pairing and we were more than blown away by how tasty and well thought out each course was. Truly amazing food, drink and service. A real treat for the tastebuds!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Excellent modern Italian restaurant in an otherwise very touristy area of Amsterdam. Small menu focuses on fresh ingredients. Pretty dining room and very very nice, helpful, friendly service. Very friendly to our children, they made them some special simple pasta and split an entree. Vegetarian options as well. A bit pricey.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: I could find top quality Italian tradition and knowledge in every dish. Flavors and tastes were new, penetrating, fulfilling. The atmosphere is elegant and peaceful, perfect quiet dimention to have this kind of deep experience. The best ‚Ä¶

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Amazing restaurant, Best Italian in the city. The staff is always a joy to be around and the guys form the kitchen always working hard! Highly recommended. Best organic food in Amsterdam!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: High quality food, creative cuisine with solid foundation of italian traditions. Biggest strength the selection of wines. Top quality and food match at reasonable price by discovering niche production. Kindness and cozy atmosphere are also a plus.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Exquisite food, great and thoughtful service. Truly recommended.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: This place was absolutely wonderful! Delicious slow italian food, prepared excellently with attention to our gluten and dairy allergies. The owner/host was very warm and friendly. One of the most pleasurable dining experiences that was not rushed but also did not take too long. Highly recommend!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Nice restaurant, but slow to produce the food despite a small menu. Starters were excellent, we had ravioli and squid. However the main course of monkfish took over an hour to come and was poor, over cooked and flavourless.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: For sure the Best Italian restaurant in Amsterdam, using the best quality ingredients (from Italy, not from Dutch distributors that you don't know where they come from...) and the owner itself takes time to explain exactly where from Italy ‚Ä¶

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Fantastic place with great selection of fresh food. Would recommend to go for a menu choice to get ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù dishes selected by the Chief. Done it three times and never regretted

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Exactly what I would expect from a high-end Italian place in Amsterdam: traditional techniques applied to novel and creative dishes. Honestly way better than most food I ate in Italy.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Very good food and very good wine to go with it. A perfect place for a night out with friends with plenty of time to talk in between courses. But with all of this it is in a higher price range.

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: The best Italian restaurant I've been to in Amsterdam... it's as authentic as it can get... the flavours woke up all our senses... the owner and the waiters are warm and lovely and the service is perfect. Will definitely come again....

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Best Italian restaurant in Amsterdam. Organic slowfood, modern cousin, always an experience. We always go for surprise menu with wine arrangement. Wide choice of natural wine and great service

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: Brilliant food and service. We've visited the restaurant as well as ordering their gourmet box for home. Simply delicious!

Name: Pianeta Terra
Review Text: We had the best time at Pianeta Terra. Very warm and welcoming people, and absolutely great food and drinks. The fish carpaccio was amazing, and the lamb- to die for. Literally melting in your mouth! I could eat that all day, every day. ‚Ä¶
